component.name: searchById
component.description: Search a specific Resource By ID.

component.name: searchPatient
component.description: The Patient resource provides general demographic information about a person receiving health care services from a specific organization.

component.name: searchRelatedPerson
component.description: The RelatedPerson resource provides information about a person who is involved in the care of a patient but has no formal responsibility.

component.name: searchImmunization
component.description: The Immunization resource includes the view of current and historical administration of vaccinations to a patient in all health care settings

component.name: searchMedicationAdministration
component.description: The Medication Administration resource provides information about medications and vaccines administered to a patient or consumed by a patient

component.name: searchMedicationStatement
component.description: The Medication Statement resource provides a snapshot in time of known medications taken by the patient now or in the past reported by either the patient, significant other or a provider.

component.name: searchMedicationOrder
component.description: The Medication Order resource provides orders for all medications along with administration instructions for a patient in both the inpatient and outpatient setting

component.name: searchCarePlan
component.description: The CarePlan resource describes the intentions of how one or more practitioners plan to deliver care to a specific patient.

component.name: searchGoal
component.description: The Goal resource describes intended objectives for a patient.

component.name: searchAllergyIntolerance
component.description: The AllergyIntolerance resource provides the clinical assessment of a patient’s allergy or intolerance

component.name: searchCondition
component.description: The Condition resource is used to record details about a patient’s problems, diagnoses, or other health matters that are concerning.

component.name: searchProcedure
component.description: The Procedure resource returns current and historical procedures performed on a patient.

component.name: searchDiagnosticReport
component.description: The DiagnosticReport resource typically provides a textual set of information and interpretation after performing a diagnostic service or procedure

component.name: searchObservation
component.description: The Observation resource provides measurements or simple assertions about a patient.

component.name: searchSchedule
component.description: The Schedule resource provides a time period (planning horizon) where time slots are defined for booking an appointment.

component.name: searchSlot
component.description: The Slot resource returns time slots from a schedule which are available for booking an appointment..

component.name: searchAppointment
component.description: The Appointment resource provides information about scheduled appointments

component.name: searchDevice
component.description: The Device resource currently exposes the known implant history for a patient at this site.

component.name: searchNewEncounter
component.description: The Encounter resource provides admissions or visits during which health care services were provided to a patient

component.name: searchPerson
component.description: The Person resource identifies an individual outside of a specific health care context providing a mechanism to link person resources across different facilities or organizations

component.name: searchContract
component.description: The Contract resource is currently limited to representing people who are authorized to view a patient’s data

component.name: searchBinary
component.description: The Binary resource can contain any clinical content such as text, images, and PDFs. This resource is currently limited to Continuity of Care Documents (CCD), clinical documents, and diagnostic reports.

component.name: searchDocumentReference
component.description: The DocumentReference resource is used to reference a clinical document for a patient within the health system

component.name: searchPractitioner
component.description: The Practitioner resource provides information about a person formally involved in the care of a patient on behalf of a healthcare facility.
